text: allaah ke siva jinhen ye pukaarate hai, tum unake prati apashabd ka prayog na karo. aisa na ho ki ve had se aage badhakar agyaan vash allaah ke prati apashabd ka prayog karane lagen. isee prakaar hamane har giroh ke lie usake karm ko suhaavana bana diya hai. phir unhen apane rab kee hee or lautana hai. us samay vah unhen bata dega. jo kuchh ve karate rahe honge
